p: The formation of Fe 3O 4-NPs and its morphological dimensions was studied using the FESEM ( Figure 7). The study demonstrated that the average size of the NPs was in a limited area of 27-34â€‰nm. It also exhibits the formation of cube-shaped FeNPs. The formation of cube-shaped NPs was induced by enzymes, chlorine, and magnesium compounds present in the plant sample, which influences the nanoparticles' morphology. Because of a very narrow electron beam, FESEM micrographs have a complete depth of field that is a 3D appearance trait to understand a helpful sample [ 61, 71].
